description:
DEPS: bump nacl revision. 

NaCl integration tests are still disabled due to a
recent change to ppapi/ppapi_cpp.gypi that breaks
native_client/site_scons/gyp_extract.py parser. The breakage was not detected
because the tests were off. The parser must be fixed first in native_client.

BUG=none
TEST=bots
Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=91789
